summary.para: The TF_DA_COLOR structure contains color data used in the display attributes for a range of text.
Specifies the color type as defined in the enumeration.
Specifies the color as a system color index as defined in . This member is used only if type is equal to TF_CT_SYSCOLOR.
Specifies the color as an RGB value. This member is used only if type is equal to TF_CT_COLORREF.
